body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Laws & Policies     Superintendent's Compendium                Whiskeytown Superintendent's Compendium       The Superintendent's Compendium (2016) is a document consisting of designations, closures, permit requirements, and other restrictions imposed under discretionary authority. Visitors may find this document helpful in that it provides regulations and information in addition to those contained within Title 36, Code of Federal Regulations, Chapter 1, Parts 1-7. Visitors can click on the maps on the right side of the screen and below to reference specific areas described within the Superintendent's Compendium document. Click Here to view a PDF of the Superintendent's Compendium (2016).         The forested mountains of Whiskeytown provide excellent opportunities for hunters. NPS  Click here to view a map of Whiskeytown's Hunting Areas        Shasta Bally Road near the summit. NPS  Click here to view a map of Whiskeytown's Roads        Kayakers enjoying the lake's tranquility from Brandy Creek's no wake zone. NPS  Click here to view a map of Whiskeytown's Designated No Wake Zones        Whiskeytown Visitor Center NPS  Click here to view a map of Whiskeytown's Designated First Amendment Activity Areas       Click here to view a map of Whiskeytown's Designated Smoking Areas
title: Whiskeytown National Recreation Area: Superintendent's Compendium
